individual_metadata.synopsis: Impatient goblin sharpening his spears while guarding a heretical goblin. A bit of an attitude to this one.
individual_metadata.how_to_trigger: in recon: teleport S_GOB_RaiderBoldTalk to Warrior Clack

0.speaker: Warrior Clack
0.text: If yer close enough to talk with me, then yer too damn close.
0.context: NodeContext: Busy sharpening spears, a bit brusque.

1.speaker: Warrior Clack
1.text: I gotta sharpen these spears - ain't got time for conversin'.
